member.name: LIBRARYMANAGEDIALOGOPTIONS
member.summary: Used by to define options for handling a name collision when saving a library.

member.name: LIBRARYMANAGEDIALOGOPTIONS.LMD_DEFAULT
member.summary: Show default warning UI to the user.

member.name: LIBRARYMANAGEDIALOGOPTIONS.LMD_ALLOWUNINDEXABLENETWORKLOCATIONS
member.summary: Do not display a warning dialog to the user in collisions that concern network locations that cannot be indexed.
